Package ui.game.menu.playerConfigs

Class PlayerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.input.selection.DrawableSelectableSection
        • ui.menu.Dialog
          • ui.menu.Menu
            • ui.game.menu.playerConfigs.PlayerConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintHandler, Section, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientPlayerConfig, PlayerConfig.NamedPlayerConfig, ServerPlayerConfig
    public abstract class PlayerConfig
extends Menu
    Represents a player's configuration menu.
    Represents a menu containing a list of selectable menu items.
    Represents a bordered box with a section in the top and a row of buttons at the bottom.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

      • PlayerConfig

        public PlayerConfig​(TerminalHandler terminalHandler,
                    boolean enabled,
                    boolean player2,
                    MenuItem[] extras)
        Constructor for PlayerConfig.
        Parameters:
        terminalHandler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - If the config menu is enabled for selection.
        player2 - Boolean; true if config menu belongs to player 2.
        extras - Implementation specific menu items.
